widgets.label: FX
widgets.onValue:
send(false, "/action/40769", 1)
send(false, "/action/_BR_FOCUS_TRACKS", 1)
send(false, "/track/@{parent.variables.n}/select", 1)
send(false, "/device/track/select/@{parent.variables.n}", 1)

set('show_fxPanel', 1)
set('sel_trkFx', 1)
set('fxParBankSel', 0)

widgets.label: ^download
^upload

widgets.html: ReaperControl - OSC controller template for Reaper digital audio workstation Setup Reaper: 1. add a new OSC control surface in Reaper preferences 2. configure ports according to the settings in Open Stage Control 3. if Open Stage Control runs on the same machine, use 127.0.0.1 as Device IP 4. select Pattern config "Default" 5. check "Allow binding messages to Reaper actions and FX learn" MIDI Controls: 1. add MIDI port "OSC:virtual" in OSC launcher 2. activate OSC MIDI port in Reaper MIDI input devices 3. select OSC MIDI input as track input mj/2024

widgets.comments: OSC action doesn't work in Reaper 7.27

widgets.label: ^copy > ^align-left
widgets.comments: Copy focused fx to selected tracks (MPL script)

widgets.onValue:
set('load_settings', 1)

send(false, "/device/track/count/12", 1)
send(false, "/device/send/count/4", 1)
send(false, "/device/receive/count/4", 1)
send(false, "/device/fx/count/6", 1)
send(false, "/device/fxparam/count/16", 1)
send(false, "/device/fxinstparam/count/16", 1)
send(false, "/device/marker/count/20", 1)
send(false, "/device/region/count/20", 1)
send(false, "/action/41743", 1) // refresh all surfaces

widgets.label: ^upload
